sen.j: 十津川温泉（とつかわおんせん）は、奈良県吉野郡十津川村（旧国大和国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring in Totsukawa-mura, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture (the former Yamato Province).
Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring in Totsukawa-mura, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture (the former Yamato Province).
Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring in Totsukawa-mura, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture (the former Yamato Province).

sen.j: 車 五條市・新宮市から国道168号
sen.e: By car Take National route 168 from Gojo City or Singu City.
By car: Take National route 168 from Gojo City or Singu City.
sen.cmt: By carの後ろにコロンを挿入
sen.e: By car: Take National route 168 from Gojo City or Singu City.

sen.j: バス 近畿日本鉄道大和八木駅、西日本旅客鉄道五条駅 (奈良県)、JR新宮駅より奈良交通（八木新宮線、十津川線） - 「十津川温泉」停留所
sen.e: By bus Take Nara Kotsu Bus Lines (Yagi-Shingu Route, Totsukawa Route) from Yamato-Yagi Station of Kinki Nippon Railway Company, Gojo Station of West Japan Railway Company (Nara Prefecture), or JR Singu Station and get off the bus at the bus stop, `Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring.'

By bus: Take Nara Kotsu Bus Lines (Yagi-Shingu Route, Totsukawa Route) from Yamato-Yagi Station of the Kinki Nippon Railway Company, Gojo Station of the West Japan Railway Company (Nara Prefecture), or JR Singu Station and get off the bus at the bus stop, `Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring.'
sen.cmt: By busの後ろにコロンを挿入
sen.e: By bus: Take Nara Kotsu Bus Lines (Yagi-Shingu Route, Totsukawa Route) from Yamato-Yagi Station of the Kinki Nippon Railway Company, Gojo Station of the West Japan Railway Company (Nara Prefecture), or JR Singu Station and get off the bus at the bus stop, `Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring.'
bicarbonated salt springs
bicarbonated salt springs
bicarbonated salt springs

sen.j: 二津野ダムの湖畔に吉乃屋、植田屋などの旅館が点在する。
sen.e: Japanese Inns such as Yoshinoya Inn, Uedaya Inn are scattered on the bank of Futatsuno Dam.
Japanese Inns such as Yoshinoya Inn, Uedaya Inn are scattered on the bank of Futatsuno Dam.
Japanese Inns such as Yoshinoya Inn, Uedaya Inn are scattered on the bank of Futatsuno Dam.

sen.j: 共同浴場は2軒、日帰り入浴施設は1軒存在する。
sen.e: There are two communal bathes and one day visit spa.
There are two communal baths and one day visit spa.
There are two communal baths and one day visit spa.

sen.j: 温泉地は日本百名湯にも選ばれている。
sen.e: The spa is selected as one of 100 famous spas in Japan.
The spa is selected as one of 100 famous spas in Japan.
The spa is selected as one of 100 famous spas in Japan.

sen.j: 源泉の発見は元禄年間である。
sen.e: The source of Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring was found during the Genroku era.
The source of Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring was found in the Genroku era.
The source of Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring was found in the Genroku era.

sen.j: 上湯川沿いに源泉はあり、上湯温泉に対して下湯と呼ばれていた。
sen.e: The source of Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring was located along kamiyukawa River, and it is called Shimoyu, apart from Kamiyu Onsen hot spring..
The source of Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring was located along the kamiyukawa River, and it is called Shimoyu, compared to Kamiyu Onsen hot spring.
sen.cmt: kamiyukawa River に定冠詞the を付与、後半の表現の見直し
sen.e: The source of Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring was located along the kamiyukawa River, and it is called Shimoyu, compared to Kamiyu Onsen hot spring.

sen.j: 1974年にダム湖が出来た際に、湖畔まで源泉を引湯し、温泉街を形成した。
sen.e: The source was drawn to the bank of Futstsuno Dam to develop a hot spring resort when the dam lake was completed in 1974.
The source was drawn to the bank of Futstsuno Dam to develop a hot spring resort when the dam lake was completed in 1974.
The source was drawn to the bank of Futstsuno Dam to develop a hot spring resort when the dam lake was completed in 1974.

sen.j: 1985年（昭和60年）3月19日、湯泉地温泉、上湯温泉とともに国民保養温泉地に指定。
sen.e: On March 19, 1985, it was designated as one of People's Recreation Spa, along with Tosenji Onsen Hot Spring and Kamiyu Onsen Hot Spring..
On March 19, 1985, it was designated as one of People's Recreation Spa, along with Tosenji Onsen Hot Spring and Kamiyu Onsen Hot Spring..
On March 19, 1985, it was designated as one of People's Recreation Spa, along with Tosenji Onsen Hot Spring and Kamiyu Onsen Hot Spring..

sen.j: 2004年6月28日、十津川村役場が、村内の温泉の「100%源泉掛け流し宣言」を発表した。
sen.e: On June 28, 2004, Totsukawa-mura village office declared that hot springs within Totsukawa-mura village are` 100% free-flowing hot-spring.'
On June 28, 2004, Totsukawa-mura village office declared that hot springs within Totsukawa-mura village are` 100% free-flowing hot-spring.'
On June 28, 2004, Totsukawa-mura village office declared that hot springs within Totsukawa-mura village are` 100% free-flowing hot-spring.'
